thompson.description: Thompson Window Film — a modern corporate website for window film services

sections.title: Design
sections.desc: The design emphasizes the company’s reliability and professionalism. A clean layout, strong headings, and visual sections help users quickly understand the services. The color palette fits the automotive and technical industry. The design stays focused on service value without distractions.

sections.title: Technical solution
sections.desc: The website is built with a focus on performance and stability. It is fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Navigation is clear and intuitive, making services and contact information easy to find. The codebase is clean and scalable for future growth.

sections.title: Marketing
sections.desc:
The content is conversion-focused and benefit-driven. Services are explained through value:
— UV protection
— interior comfort
— preserving vehicle and property value
Contact and consultation sections encourage quick interaction.

sections.title: Client experience
sections.desc: The website provides a smooth user experience. Clients can easily choose a service, understand its benefits, and contact the company. All essential information is clear and accessible.

sections.title: Business value
sections.desc: The website acts as an online sales tool, strengthening brand image, presenting services professionally, and generating new leads.
